title: ArtyTorrent Pack 82-Spectrasonics Atmosphere VSTi Disc 6+update
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 82-Spectrasonics Atmosphere VSTi Disc 6+update
---------------------------------------------------------------

This is the final part of the 6 disc set, provided as an ISO for burning or mounting on a virtual drive. Previous discs are available on TPB.

Atmosphere is a "Dream Synth" ROMpler instrument with a superb soundbank of 3.4GB of synth leads, pads and basses. It&#039;s one of my favourite synth plug-ins because it has so many excellent sounds and the clear GUI makes it very easy to use.

The retail version is provided on 6 CD-ROMs. I&#039;ve posted each one separately in the past couple of days.

A keygen was included with Disc 1. An update to version 2.1 is included in this pack, along with installation instructions.

The update is included in a RAR file and should enable the synth to be used with Pro Tools, and also enables syncing the VSTi&#039;s LFOs to your sequencer host.

I hope you have a problem-free installation and enjoy this synth. Thanks for seeding!

--
Arty - "Just don&#039;t ask for all 56 Gigs of Omnisphere!"
22nd February 2008
